transformations.headline: Evidence-Based Security Architecture for Enterprise Environments
transformations.tagline: 20+ years of applied enterprise security research and practice
transformations.aboutIntro: Senior Sales Engineer specializing in enterprise security architecture with over 20 years of applied research and practice. Currently at SentinelOne (November 2021-Present), with 16 years of prior research at McAfee. Focus areas include EDR/XDR implementation methodologies, large-scale security architecture (500,000+ endpoints), and evidence-based sales engineering frameworks.
transformations.experience: 20+ years conducting applied enterprise security research across sales engineering, security architecture, and technical consultation. Research contributions include DOW 30 enterprise conversion methodologies, $50M revenue management frameworks, and security architecture at 500,000+ endpoint scale. Published technical documentation and presented research findings at major industry conferences.
transformations.education: Bachelor of Business Administration in Computer Information Systems, Georgia State University, Atlanta, GA. Academic foundation for technical research and business analysis.
transformations.currentRole: Senior Sales Engineer at SentinelOne (November 2021-Present). Research focus on enterprise security evaluation methodologies, POC design frameworks, and technical consultation approaches.
transformations.previousRole: SR Enterprise Sales Engineer at McAfee (April 2005 - November 2021). 16 years developing and refining sales engineering methodologies, security architecture frameworks, and enterprise account management approaches.
transformations.approach: Evidence-based, analytical, systematic. Discovery-driven research methodology. Hypothesis-tested POC frameworks. Data-informed decision support.

contentPrinciples: Sentence length: 15-25 words. Complex when warranted, but clear.
Word choice: Research terminology (methodology, analysis, framework, evidence-based)
Tone: Scholarly but accessible, collaborative discovery
POV: Research orientation ('Our findings show...', 'Analysis reveals...')

exampleContent.serviceDescription: Enterprise security architecture research and implementation. Evidence-based methodologies for EDR, XDR, and SIEM deployment at scale (100,000+ endpoints). Framework development for security evaluation, vendor selection, and implementation planning.
exampleContent.achievementStatement: Research validation through 3 DOW 30 enterprise conversions. $50M annual revenue management across research portfolio. Large-scale implementation studies (500,000+ endpoints). Academic contributions through conference presentations recognized as highest-attended sessions outside keynotes.
exampleContent.skillsIntro: 20+ years applied research in enterprise security (EDR, XDR, SIEM, network security). Cloud infrastructure architecture research (AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible). 1,000+ hours AI development research with focus on LLM orchestration and intelligent automation frameworks.
